title: American Horror Story Season 10: Double Feature Trailer (HD) Part 1: Red Tide
author: TV Promos
comment: Lily rabe finally getting the leading role she deserves!
This looks like Asylum, Murder House, Roanoke and Cult in one season. Can't wait!
The iconic Macaulay Culkin in AHS?! This is such a brilliant casting, he's the perfect fit for this show! So SO excited!
I’m kinda getting The Shining vibes. Dad moves his spouse and child to a place to write a book and then goes crazy.
this gives me pure murderhouse vibes and i’m absolutely loving it, i can’t wait
description:
A collision of terror like you've never seen - horror by land and horror by sea. American Horror Story Season 10: Double Feature premieres August 25th on FX, next day on Hulu. Subscribe to tvpromosdb on Youtube for more American Horror Story season 10 promos in HD!
